short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web Extension forcing 'The Settlers Online' to use the same language as your browser!

long.ar,de,el,en_GB,en_US,es,es_419,fr,it,nl,: This extension will force  'The Settlers Online' to use the same language as your browser.
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,en,en_AU,et,fa,fi,fil,: Babel reconfigures 'The Settlers Online' launcher script to use your native language. It does this by slightly changing page content: it modifies 2 variables: "lang" and "realmLang". Regardless of defaults provided by game server, "lang" and "realmLang" are going to be set to values based on your browser localization.
